April 12-14 2019, Birmingham, Al

About PMM Day

The PMM Weekend is a weekend of events showcasing the family portion of the long standing Miles College Purple Maching Machine. The main purpose of this event is build a funraising hub to donate back to our band and to create a tradition that bridges the gaps between old-school band members, those that marched under the direction of Mr. Arthur Means from 1996-2006, the more current band members that marched under the direction of Mr. Donald Crawford from 2007-2012, Mr.James Merriweather from 2012-2016, and the current members of the Purple Marching Machine, under the direction of Mr. Willie Snipes.

Schedule of Events

Friday, 12

Kick-Off Party

6:00PM

PMM Weekend Kick-Off Party
Friday, 4/12 location: Sleek Sports Bar 1005 20th St S, Birmingham, AL 35205

This is the first day of the PMM Weekend and it begins with a pre-party. This is an opportunity for new and old members to meet up, party, and see each other before the big saturday picnic. This event is ideal for those who are coming in from out of town and those that just want to hang with other band members and fellowship.

This event is a adult event and will include alcohol & smoke.

Saturday, 13

PMM Picnic

11:00AM

PMM Picnic
Saturday, 4/13 Location: Fairfield City Park

The first PMM Picnic will be held on a Saturday at Fairfield City Park. We will have an open booth when you get to the park to grab you wrist band for those that pre-ordered and a line for those who need a wristband. You must pay the entry fee in order to participate in the picnic. Food and drinks will only be given to those that possess a wristband.

Please be mindful of those that have volunteered to make sure this event is a success and that we are here to also generate funds back to the band. Please be responsible and purchase a wristband for this event.

Saturday, 13

After-Party

8:00pM

PMM Picnic After Party
Saturday, 4/13 Location: Blue Onyx 615 8th Ave W, Birmingham, AL 35204

The After Party for the picnic will take place at Blue Onxy Club. The party will start at 8 and last until the club closes. Admission at the door will be $15 and will subject to change. We are selling presale tickets for $10.

Sunday, 14

Directors Appreciation

10:00AM

Church & Farwell
Sunday, 4/14 Location: First Baptist Church of Fairfield 324 59th St, Fairfield, AL 35064

PMM has also based itself on putting the lord first and formost and it is for this reason we have been able to continue to thrive in the manner we have been all these years.

With this year being the first year for the PMM Weekend, We would like to take this time to honor the previous and present band directors of The Purple Marching Machine for we would not have this organization without them and time is short and we must appreciate what we have now. So join us at the First Baptist Church of Fairfield to honor Mr. Means, Crawford, Merriweather and Snipes.
